Description: Aircall empowers teams to ace every call with a phone system specifically built for their favorite business tools.
Name: Aircall

Methods.Name: Get Number
Methods.Description: Gets detail of the specified number.

Methods.Name: List Numbers
Methods.Description: Lists all numbers.

Methods.Name: New Numbers
Methods.Description: Gets Numbers added since the last run of this process.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Gets full details of a user including the associated numbers.

Methods.Name: Update User
Methods.Description: Updates the details of a user,

Methods.Name: Delete User
Methods.Description: Deletes a user.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all Users.

Methods.Name: Create User
Methods.Description: Creates a new user.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Gets details of the specified Contact.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Removes  a contact.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Update the details of an existing Contact.

Methods.Name: New Contacts
Methods.Description: List new Contacts since the last run of this process.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a new contact.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Lists all Contacts.

Methods.Name: Get Tag
Methods.Description: Gets details of the specified Tag.

Methods.Name: Delete Tag
Methods.Description: Removes a Tag.

Methods.Name: Update Tag
Methods.Description: Updates the details of a Tag.

Methods.Name: List Tags
Methods.Description: List all tags.

Methods.Name: Create Tag
Methods.Description: Creates a new Tag.

Methods.Name: Delete Webhook
Methods.Description: Completely removes a Webhook.

Methods.Name: Get Webhook
Methods.Description: Gets the details of a Webhook.

Methods.Name: List Webhooks
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Webhooks.

Methods.Name: Create Webhook
Methods.Description: Creates a Webhook.

Methods.Name: Get Team
Methods.Description: Gets details of a Team.

Methods.Name: Add Team User
Methods.Description: Adds a User to a Team.

Methods.Name: Remove Team User
Methods.Description: Removes a User from a Team.

Methods.Name: List Teams
Methods.Description: Gets a full list of Teams.

Methods.Name: Create Team
Methods.Description: Creates a new Team.

Methods.Name: Get Call
Methods.Description: Gets details of a call.

Methods.Name: Tag Call
Methods.Description: Apply Tags to a Call.

Methods.Name: Comment Call
Methods.Description: Add comments to a Call.

Methods.Name: Start Call
Methods.Description: Start a call

Methods.Name: List Calls
Methods.Description: List all calls.

Methods.Name: New Calls
Methods.Description: List all new calls since the last run of this process.

Methods.Name: Notify New Contact
Methods.Description: Receives notifications that a new contact has been created.

Methods.Name: Notify Deleted Contact
Methods.Description: Receives notifications that a contact has been deleted.

Methods.Name: Notify Updated Contact
Methods.Description: Receives notifications that a Contact has been updated.

Methods.Name: Notify Add Del User
Methods.Description: Receives notifications for of addition and deletions to Users list.

Methods.Name: Notify Add Del Number
Methods.Description: Receives notifications for addition and deletions to Numbers.
